regenerator-transform

Transform async/generator functions with regenerator

Installation

sh $ npm install regenerator-transform

Usage

Via .babelrc (Recommended)

.babelrc

js // without options { "plugins": ["regenerator-transform"] } // with options { "plugins": [ ["regenerator-transform", { asyncGenerators: false, // true by default generators: false, // true by default async: false // true by default }] ] }

Via CLI

sh $ babel --plugins regenerator-transform script.js

Via Node API

javascript require("babel-core").transform("code", { plugins: ["regenerator-transform"] });
